title: Army Streamlining Command Posts, Reducing Equipment Needs
text:
12 Army Streamlining Command Posts, Reducing Equipment Needs 
Defense News: WASHINGTON â€” The US Army is streamlining and modernizing its upper-echelon command posts so they need fewer people and equipment when deploying to crises and training missions, officials said Monday at the Association of the US Army annual meeting.
